section.heading: Receipt for custodial property.
section.text: A written acknowledgement of delivery by a custodian constitutes a sufficient receipt and discharge for custodial property transferred under this act.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act.
“This act”, referred to at the end of the section, is the District of Columbia Uniform Transfers to Minors Act, D.C. Law 6-87 which is codified primarily as § 21-301 et seq.
